SCSSdkClient.​Object.​SCSTelemetry.​Truck.​Current.​Dashboard

SCSSdkClient.​Object.​SCSTelemetry.​Truck.​Current.​Dashboard

Speed, RPM, Pressures, Temperatures

Functions
Dashboard
public Dashboard()

Initialise a dashboard object

Information
Speed

Uses negative value to represent reverse movement

CruiseControlSpeed

Is zero if the cruise control is disabled

GearDashboard
- > 0

Forward gears

-  0

Neutral

- < 0

Reverse gears
